amendment.description: To strike the provision relating to laboratory- or production facility-directed research and development programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2326 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2326 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4195) To strike the provision relating to laboratory- or production facility-directed research and development programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2326 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2326 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2301.
